class tricorder.WindowManager(fullscreen_en=False)

Bases: object

Decides which screen will be shown next.

Also handles:

-> screenshots

-> some display functions

-> custom user events

-> some data logging

-> some bluetooth stuff

Check if log file exists. Create if does not exist.
